channel.title: Software Transactional Memory on Lily Tsai
channel.description: Recent content in Software Transactional Memory on Lily Tsai

item.title: STO: Software Transactional Objects
item.description: STO is a Software Transactional Memory (STM) that improves performance by tracking abstract operations instead of memory words. Source code Publications Senior Thesis on transactional data structures EuroSys ‘16 Paper on the STO system itself
